mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER ( ID, ROLE, RATING, PRIVACY, EMAIL, NICKNAME, PASSWORD, INTRO, PROFILEIMG, STATUS, CREATEAT, UPDATEAT ) VALUES ( MEMBER_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{role}, 0, 'open', #{email}, #{nickname}, #{password}, #{intro}, #{profileImg}, 'confirm', SYSDATE, SYSDATE )
mapper.select: SELECT ID AS "id", ROLE AS "role", RATING AS "rating", PRIVACY AS "privacy", EMAIL AS "email", NICKNAME AS "nickname", PASSWORD AS "password", INTRO AS "intro", PROFILEIMG AS "profileImg", STATUS AS "status", CREATEAT AS "createat", UPDATEAT AS "updateat" FROM MEMBER WHERE EMAIL = #{email}

SELECT m.id, m.nickname, m.profileimg, m.privacy, CASE WHEN m.id = #{currentUserId} THEN 1 WHEN f.follow_id IS NOT NULL THEN 2
END AS relation_priority, CASE WHEN EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM stories WHERE member_id = m.id AND createAt > SYSDATE - INTERVAL '24' HOUR ) THEN 'true' ELSE 'false' END AS is_act_story, CASE WHEN ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM stories s WHERE s.member_id = m.id AND s.createat > SYSDATE - INTERVAL '24' HOUR ) = 0 THEN 'false' WHEN ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM stories s WHERE s.member_id = m.id AND s.createat > SYSDATE - INTERVAL '24' HOUR ) = ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM story_visitors sv JOIN stories s ON sv.stories_id = s.id WHERE s.member_id = m.id AND sv.member_id = #{currentUserId} AND s.createat > SYSDATE - INTERVAL '24' HOUR ) THEN 'true' ELSE 'false' END AS is_visited FROM member m LEFT JOIN follows f ON m.id = f.follow_id AND f.member_id = #{currentUserId} WHERE m.id = #{currentUserId} OR f.follow_id IS NOT NULL ORDER BY relation_priority ASC, m.nickname ASC
